title: Week 7 NFL Recap: Cam Newton benched, Tom Brady thriving, DK Metcalf chasedown, Steelers remain unbeaten (Football 10/26)
description:
Wow! What a wild Sunday in the NFL. Week 7 arguably the best of the year to date with some absolutely insane finishes. DK Metcalf did the impossible by chasing down Budda Baker, but the Cardinals submitted an equally surprising victory over the Seahawks on SNF. Tom Brady and Bill Belichick are experiencing quite different 2020 seasons in their first year apart from each other. Meanwhile, the Steelers staked their claim in the 'elite' category as now the last remaining undefeated team in the league. All those game breakdowns and more in this week's recap pod.
Cardinals-Seahawks (2:00)
49ers-Patriots (14:45)
Bucs-Raiders (14:45)
Steelers-Titans (32:00)
Washington-Cowboys (39:15)
Browns-Bengals (47:45)
Chargers-Jaguars (56:15)
Lions-Falcons (1:02:30)
Saints-Panthers (1:10:30)
Chiefs-Broncos (1:19:00)
Packers-Texans (1:23:15)
Bills-Jets (1:28:30)
Winners/Losers (1:34:00)
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
